ActProhibition on the Purchase of Residential Property by Non-Canadians Act
SubjectProhibition on the Purchase of Residential Property by Non-Canadians Regulations
PrecisPROHIBITION ON THE PURCHASE OF RESIDENTIAL PROPERTY BY NON-CANADIANS REGULATIONS in order to (1) establish exceptions for certain groups of people from the prohibition in the Act; (2) establish exceptions for recreational properties; (3) clarify the application of the prohibition to vacant land in limited circumstances; (4) clarify the prohibitions for certain unexpected or transitional life situations; (5) clarify the process whereby a court may order the sale of a residential property purchased by a non-Canadian in contravention of the prohibition; and (6) clarify that the prohibition does not apply in circumstances where it would conflict with Indigenous rights.
